thread.title: NPP Cracks Deepen As Afoko Dismisses Alleged Emergency NEC Meeting Called By Freddy Blay
thread.title_full: NPP Cracks Deepen As Afoko Dismisses Alleged Emergency NEC Meeting Called By Freddy Blay - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: NPP Cracks Deepen As Afoko Dismisses Alleged Emergency NEC Meeting Called By Freddy Blay
text: The National Chairman of the opposition New Patriotic Party ( NPP ) has cancelled an emergency meeting allegedly called by the Party 's 1st Vice Chairman , Freddie Blay . A statement available to Peacefmonline.com and signed by Paul Afoko says;
